'''Adam''' is one of the students of [[Madeleine Skurski]] who visited her in the hospital.

==History==
He is in Ms. Skurski's math and science class. When Ms. Skurski became ill, [[Emma (Idle Hands)|Emma]], [[Lucas]], and Adam skipped their after-school study session to see her. They then returned with the rest of their class, which is when Ms. Skurski broke the news that she wouldn't be returning to school.

==Relationships==
===Professional===
He loves his teacher, Ms. Skurski. When Ms. Skurski got sick and Mr. Arnold replaced her, he came to the hospital to see Ms. Skurski.
